verses.text: That man hath perfect blessedness who walketh not astra chair:
But placeth his delight Upon GOD`s law, and meditates on his law day and t.
psalm 2  v2 placeth his delight Upon GOD`s law, and meditates on his law day and t.
psalm 3 placeth his delight Upon GOD`s law, and meditates on his law day and t.
psalm 4 placeth his delight Upon GOD`s law, and meditates on his law day and t.
